title: ****BWA photo shoot at the Volksworld Show****

posts.content:
pye1man wrote:
tufty65 wrote:
gazmate wrote:
Just read this, did it happen?


Only Rikki, Frank and myself turned up so no it didnt !

Think Rikki may try again at big bang.



Surprised you made it after satuarday night


To be honest I didn't get to the show until 12.30pm and that was only because I had to check out the hotel !

tufty65 wrote:
gazmate wrote:
Just read this, did it happen?


Only Rikki, Frank and myself turned up so no it didnt !

Think Rikki may try again at big bang.



Should be a better turn out at big bang. Be very cool to have a pic of all the busses lined up on the track togeather.

Ill be there anyway
